task_details.title: Explore blockchain technology
task_details.description: Gain insights into how cryptocurrencies are created, stored, and transferred by understanding blockchain technology.

subtasks.title: Understand the concept of mining in blockchain
subtasks.description: Learn how mining works in blockchain and its role in validating transactions and creating new blocks.

subtasks.title: Research different mining algorithms
subtasks.description: Explore the various mining algorithms used in blockchain, such as Proof of Work (PoW) and Proof of Stake (PoS).

subtasks.title: Understand the energy consumption of different mining algorithms
subtasks.description: Dive into the energy consumption and environmental impact of different mining algorithms in blockchain.

subtasks.title: Explore the concept of decentralized consensus
subtasks.description: Understand how blockchain achieves consensus in a decentralized network without a central authority.

subtasks.title: Learn about different consensus mechanisms
subtasks.description: Research and compare various consensus mechanisms used in blockchain, such as Byzantine Fault Tolerance (BFT) and Delegated Proof of Stake (DPoS).
